statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.BrandName) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID , AA.Name , AA.Description
FROM dbo.TScrapCategory AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapCategory WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapCategory WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE SiteID = #SiteID# AND Name = #Name#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapCategory ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, SiteID, Name, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #SiteID#, #Name#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TScrapCategory SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, SiteID = #SiteID# , Name = #Name# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
